span.span: With the namespace, you can program custom upgrade behavior into your ClickOnce application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個命名空間中的索引鍵的類別是。The key class in this namespace is . 您可以測試是否部署有可用的更新使用或方法; 第二個方法會引發順利完成之後的事件。You can test whether your deployment has an available update by using either the or methods; the latter method raises the event when it has successfully completed. 傳回的更新，例如其版本號碼，以及它是否為目前使用者的必要的更新的重要資訊。 returns important information about the update, such as its version number and whether it is a required update for current users. 如果有可用的更新，可以安裝使用或; 第二種方法就會引發完成安裝更新之後的事件。If an update is available, you can install it by using or ; the latter method raises the event after installation of the update is finished. 大型的更新，您可以接收進度通知透過和事件，並使用中的資訊來通知使用者下載狀態。For large updates, you can receive progress notifications through the and events, and use the information in to notify the user of the download status. 您也可以使用下載大型檔案和隨選的組件。You can also use to download large files and assemblies on demand. 這些檔案必須標示為 「 選用 」 內部署的應用程式資訊清單，好讓它們不會下載進行安裝。These files must be marked as "optional" within the deployment's application manifest, so that they are not downloaded at installation. 您也可以使用應用程式的期間下載的檔案在任何時間點或方法。You can download the files at any point during the application's duration by using the or methods. 您可以下載組件，再將它們載入到記憶體所提供的事件處理常式事件類別。You can download assemblies before they are loaded into memory by supplying an event handler for the event on the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說：下載組件隨選與 ClickOnce 部署應用程式開發介面使用設計工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59a0dd5f-1cab-4f2f-b780-0ab7399905d5)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Downloading Assemblies on Demand with the ClickOnce Deployment API Using the Designer](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59a0dd5f-1cab-4f2f-b780-0ab7399905d5).
